statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT amount, merchant_name FROM financial_data WHERE is_fraud = true;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT merchant_name, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, merchant_name FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, merchant_name, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE merchant_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE flagged_by = 'admin' ORDER BY flagged_at ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM financial_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2021-09-01' AND status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = '55e843f5-0c18-4b89-9be2-e0846aa94366'

SELECT ft.transaction_id, ft.amount, ft.timestamp, ft.status, ft.user_id, ft.timestamp, ft.status, ft.amount, ft.user_id FROM financial_transactions ft INNER JOIN flagged_transactions ft on ft.transaction_id = ft.transaction_id
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE status = 'completed' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions ORDER BY flagged_at ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT max(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, detection_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT u.username, f.detection_score, ft.transaction_amount FROM users u JOIN fraud_detection f ON u.user_id = f.user_id JOIN financial_transactions ft ON f.transaction_id = ft.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, address, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT account_id, balance, last_activity_date FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY account_id;
SELECT report_id, customer_id, report_date, report_reason FROM fraud_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_balance > 5000
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.customer_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE t.is_fraud = TRUE
SELECT f.report_id, f.report_reason, c.customer_name FROM fraud_reports f JOIN customers c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT account_id, balance, created_on FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'withdraw';
SELECT alert_message, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE flag_id = 5 ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT users.username, accounts.balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id WHERE accounts.account_type = 'Savings'
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0
SELECT flags.flag_reason, alerts.alert_message FROM flags JOIN alerts ON flags.flag_id = alerts.flag_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit'
